about_the_game:
Wild Encounters is an immersive adventure game where you explore photo-realistic, breathtaking locations and reenact nature's horrific incidents as told by the survivors. Each episode presents a unique and thrilling scenario that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

The first episode of Wild Encounters takes your deep into the forest campgrounds of Cedar Woods, More episodes are coming!

Wild Encounters - Cedar Woods Campground


In the first episode, you play as David, with Amber as your girlfriend. In need of some long overdue R&R, they plan a camping trip at the remote resort, Cedar woods Campground. They look forward to camping and sightseeing in the park, but soon face nature's challenges. Will they make it through the night? Their survival depends on the choices you make.

Key Features
Photo-realistic graphics and atmospheric environments
Engage in story-driven dialogue with interactive NPCs
Take pictures with a camera
Defend or circumvent a dangerous situation.
Take some time off work and experience a camping trip in the virtual world like never before
